arts.ttl: Another Barcelona star set to miss Valencia clash through injury
arts.sum: An up-and-coming member of the midfield ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona will not be available for the club’s return to action this weekend. That’s according to Mundo Deportivo, who…

arts.ttl: Valencia manager comments on playing Barcelona at Estadi Johan Cruyff – ‘It’s an atypical situation’
arts.sum: FC Barcelona will lock horns with Valencia this Sunday in their first home game of the 2025/26 La Liga season. The game, however, will not be played at the Spotify Camp Nou, with the stadium still not ready for reopening. Instead, the Catalans will host Los Che at Estadi Johan Cruyff, in front of 6,000 […] The post Valencia manager comments on playing Barcelona at Estadi Johan Cruyff – ‘It’s an atypical situation’ appeared first on Barca Universal.
